sources.title: Man of Conflict (1953)
sources.description: Featuring Edward Arnold and John Agar. [The "MPEG4" file is the smallest file, and it's the source file. Download it if your player can handle h.265 (HEVC).]

sources.title: Man of Conflict (1953) EDWARD ARNOLD
sources.description:
Stars: Edward Arnold, John Agar, Susan Morrow
Director: Hal R. Makelim

A young man comes home prepared to take over the family business, but finds his father has been corrupted by power. In addition, he falls for the daughter of one of his father's poverty-stricken workers.

metadata.Plot: Young man comes home to get ready to take over the family company, only to find that his father has been corrupted by power. In addition, he falls for the daughter of one of his father's poverty-stricken workers.
metadata.Actors: Edward Arnold, John Agar, Susan Morrow
